DNS
[TCP/IP User Protocols]

Description

DNS Module.

The DNS address is initilized via the DHCP server. If DHCP is not used, the default DNS address is used. The default DNS address can be configured via the Web Interface.

Configuration

For details on configuring this module, see Configuration section of dns.h file.
